title: anyFilter
description: Select all exchanges

title: commentSearchFilter
description: Select exchanges by searching a string pattern into the comment property.

title: filterCollection
description: FilterCollection is a combination of multiple filters with a merging operator (OR / AND).

title: hasCommentFilter
description: Select exchanges having comment.

title: hasTagFilter
description: Select exchanges having tag.

title: ipEgressFilter
description: Select exchanges according to upstream IP address. Full IP notation is used from IPv6.

title: ipIngressFilter
description: Select exchanges according to client ip address. Full IP notation is used from IPv6.

title: isWebSocketFilter
description: Select websocket exchange.

title: contentTypeXmlFilter
description: Select exchanges having XML response body.

title: cssStyleFilter
description: Select exchanges having response content type mime matching css.

title: fontFilter
description: Select exchanges having response content type matching a font payload.

title: htmlResponseFilter
description: Select exchanges having HTML body. The content-type header is checked to determine if the content body is has text/html hint.

title: imageFilter
description: Select exchanges having response content type mime matching image.

title: jsonResponseFilter
description: Select exchanges having JSON response body. The content-type header is checked to determine if the content body is a JSON.

title: networkErrorFilter
description: Select exchanges that fails due to network error.

title: responseHeaderFilter
description: Select exchanges according to response header values.

title: statusCodeClientErrorFilter
description: Select exchanges that HTTP status code indicates a client error (4XX).

title: statusCodeFilter
description: Select exchanges according to HTTP status code.

title: statusCodeRedirectionFilter
description: Select exchanges that HTTP status code indicates a redirect (3XX).

title: statusCodeServerErrorFilter
description: Select exchanges that HTTP status code indicates a server/intermediary error (5XX).

title: statusCodeSuccessFilter
description: Select exchanges that HTTP status code indicates a successful request (2XX).

title: absoluteUriFilter
description: Select exchanges according to URI (scheme, FQDN, path and query). Supports common string search option and regular expression.

title: agentLabelFilter
description: Select exchanges according to configured source agent (user agent or process) with a regular string search.

title: authorityFilter
description: Select exchange according to hostname and a port

title: deleteFilter
description: Select exchanges with DELETE method

title: formRequestFilter
description: Select request sending 'multipart/form-data' or 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' body. Filtering is made by inspecting value of `Content-Type` header

title: formUrlEncodedRequestFilter
description: Select request sending 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' body. Filtering is made by inspecting value of `Content-Type` header

title: getFilter
description: Select exchanges with GET method

title: h11TrafficOnlyFilter
description: Select HTTP/1.1 exchanges only.

title: h2TrafficOnlyFilter
description: Select H2 exchanges only.

title: hasAnyCookieOnRequestFilter
description: Select exchanges having any request cookie

title: hasAuthorizationBearerFilter
description: Select exchanges having bearer token in authorization.

title: hasAuthorizationFilter
description: Select exchanges having authorization header.

title: hasCookieOnRequestFilter
description: Exchange having a request cookie with a specific name

title: hasRequestBodyFilter
description: Select request having body.

title: hasSetCookieOnResponseFilter
description: Search for a cookie value present in a `set-cookie` header response.If cookie name is not defined or empty, the filter will returns any cookie having the value.

title: hostFilter
description: Select exchanges according to hostname (excluding port). To select authority (combination of host:port), use <goto>AuthorityFilter</goto>.

title: isSecureFilter
description: Select secure exchange only (non plain HTTP).

title: jsonRequestFilter
description: Select request sending JSON body. Filtering is made by inspecting value of `Content-Type` header

title: methodFilter
description: Select exchanges according to request method.

title: multipartDataRequestFilter
description: Select request sending 'multipart/form-data' body. Filtering is made by inspecting value of `Content-Type` header

title: patchFilter
description: Select exchanges with PATCH method

title: pathFilter
description: Select exchanges according to url path. Path includes query string if any. Path must start with `/`

title: postFilter
description: Select POST (request method) only exchanges.

title: putFilter
description: Select exchanges according to request method.

title: queryStringFilter
description: Select exchanges containing a specific query string. If `name` is not defined or empty, the search will be performed on any query string values.The search will pass if at least one value match.

title: requestHeaderFilter
description: Select exchanges according to request header values.

title: abortAction
description: Abort an exchange at the transport level. This action will close connection between fluxzy and client which may lead to depended exchanges to be aborted too.

title: addAuthorizationBasicAction
description: Add Authorization Basic to the request header.

title: addAuthorizationBearerAction
description: Add Authorization Bearer token to the request header.

title: addRequestHeaderAction
description: Append a request header.

title: addResponseHeaderAction
description: Append a response header. H2 pseudo header will be ignored.

title: applyCommentAction
description: Add comment to exchange. Comment has no effect on the stream behaviour.

title: applyTagAction
description: Affect a tag to exchange. Tags are meta-information and do not alter the connection.

title: averageThrottleAction
description: Throttle and simulate bandwidth condition.

title: changeRequestMethodAction
description: Alter the method of an exchange.

title: changeRequestPathAction
description: Change request uri path. This action alters only the path of the request. Request path includes query string.

title: delayAction
description: Add a latency to the exchange.

title: deleteRequestHeaderAction
description: Remove request headers. This action removes every occurrence of the header from the request.

title: deleteResponseHeaderAction
description: Remove response headers. This action removes every occurrence of the header from the response.

title: fileAppendAction
description: Write to a file. Captured variable are interpreted.

title: forceHttp11Action
description: Force the connection between fluxzy and remote to be HTTP/1.1. This value is enforced by ALPN settings set during the SSL/Handshake handshake.

title: forceHttp2Action
description:
Forces the connection between fluxzy and remote to be HTTP/2.0. This value is enforced when setting up ALPN settings during SSL/TLS negotiation.
The exchange will break if the remote does not support HTTP/2.0.
This action will be ignored when the communication is clear (h2c not supported).

title: forceRemotePortAction
description: Ignores the default port used by the current authority and use the provided port instead.

title: forceTlsVersionAction
description:
Force the usage of a specific TLS version. Values can be chosen among : Tls, Tls11, Tls12, Tls13, Ssl3, Ssl2.
Forcing the usage of a specific TLS version can break the exchange if the remote does not support the requested protocol.

title: forwardAction
description: Forward request to a specific URL. This action makes fluxzy act as a reverse proxy. Unlike [SpoofDnsAction](https://www.fluxzy.io/rule/item/spoofDnsAction), host header is automatically set and protocol switch is supported (http to https, http/1.1 to h2, ...). The URL must be an absolute path.

title: impersonateAction
description: Impersonate a browser or client by changing the TLS fingerprint, HTTP/2 settings and headers.

title: mountCertificateAuthorityAction
description: Reply with the default root certificate used by fluxzy

title: noOpAction
description: An action doing no operation.

title: removeCacheAction
description: Remove all cache directive from request and response headers. This will force the clientto ask the latest version of the requested resource.

title: setClientCertificateAction
description:
Add a client certificate to the exchange. The client certificate will be used for establishing the mTLS authentication if the remote request it. The client certificate can be retrieved from the default store (my) or from a PKCS#12 file (.p12, pfx).
The certificate will not be stored in fluxzy settings and, therefore, must be available at runtime.

title: setJa3FingerPrintAction
description: Set a JA3 fingerprint of ongoing connection.

title: setUserAgentAction
description: Change the User-AgentThis action is used to change the User-Agent header of the request from a list of built-in user-agent values.

title: setVariableAction
description: Set a variable or update an existing

title: skipRemoteCertificateValidationAction
description: Skip validating remote certificate. Fluxzy will ignore any validation errors on the server certificate.

title: skipSslTunnelingAction
description: Instructs fluxzy to not decrypt the current traffic. The associated filter  must be on OnAuthorityReceived scope in order to make this action effective.

title: spoofDnsAction
description: Fix statically the remote ip or port disregards to the dns or host resolution of the current running system. Use this action to force the resolution of a hostname to a fixed IP address.

title: stdErrAction
description: Write text to standard error. Captured variable are interpreted.

title: stdOutAction
description: Write text to standard output. Captured variable are interpreted.

title: updateRequestHeaderAction
description:
Update and existing request header. If the header does not exists in the original request, the header will be added.
Use {{previous}} keyword to refer to the original value of the header.
Note Headers that alter the connection behaviour will be ignored.

title: updateResponseHeaderAction
description:
Update and existing response header. If the header does not exists in the original response, the header will be added.
Use {{previous}} keyword to refer to the original value of the header.
Note Headers that alter the connection behaviour will be ignored.

title: upStreamProxyAction
description: Use an upstream proxy.

title: useCertificateAction
description: Use a specific server certificate. Certificate can be retrieved from user store or from a PKCS12 file

title: useDnsOverHttpsAction
description: Use DoH (DNS over HTTPS) to resolve domain names instead of the default DNS provided by the OS

title: addBasicAuthenticationAction
description: Add a basic authentication (RFC 7617) to incoming exchanges with an username and a password

title: applySessionAction
description: Apply captured session data to requests. Adds cookies from session store and optionally applies stored headers. Works in conjunction with CaptureSessionAction.

title: captureSessionAction
description: Capture session data from responses. Captures Set-Cookie headers and optionally other headers like Authorization. Stored data can be replayed using ApplySessionAction.

title: clearSessionAction
description: Clear stored session data for a specific domain or all domains.

title: injectHtmlTagAction
description: This action stream a response body and inject a text after the first specified html tag.This action can be used to inject a html code snippet after opening `<head>` tag in any traversing html page.This action supports chunked transfer stream and the following body encodings: gzip, deflate, brotli and lzw.

title: mockedResponseAction
description: Reply with a pre-made response from a raw text or file

title: mountWelcomePageAction
description: Reply with fluxzy welcome page

title: removeResponseCookieAction
description: Remove a response cookie by setting the expiration date to a past date.

title: serveDirectoryAction
description: Serve a folder as a static web site. This action is made for mocking purpose and not production ready for a web site.

title: setRequestCookieAction
description: Add a cookie to request. This action is performed by adding/replacing `Cookie` header in request.

title: setResponseCookieAction
description: Add a response cookie. This action is performed by adding `Set-Cookie` header in response.
